Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Zoom above some of America's greatest landcapes and monuments in stunning HD realism.

Clip.Title: ELEPHANTS IN THE ROOM
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The largest creature that walks this planet is shrouded in mystery. It is the elephant; majestic, intelligent, dangerous. They can be man's best friend ... or his worst enemy. This is the story of an elephant called Wonky Tusk. She is the matriarch to her five family members. One of her impressive tusks point backwards and this makes her instantly recognisable. But she is famous for quite another reason...

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This aerial adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures the breathtaking beauty of America, while demonstrating how its sense of wonder has inspired countless artists, thinkers, and revolutionaries.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Zoom above some of America's greatest landcapes and monuments in stunning HD realism.

Clip.Title: ELEPHANTS IN THE ROOM

This is the story of an elephant called Wonky Tusk. She is the matriarch to her five family members. One of her impressive tusks point backwards and this makes her instantly recognisable. But she is famous for quite another reason...

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: High above the St. Lawrence River and into the Gulf of St. Lawrence, an aerial survey above the Gaspe peninsula reveals a set of natural wonders - from the Blue Whales to the stone marvels.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Vancouver Island's Eastern Coastline is a rich mix of coastal towns, islands, inland mountains and seascapes - from Nanaimo to Campbell River and beyond.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: High above the Gulf of St. Lawrence, one of the East Coast's hidden wonders lies below - the Magdalene Islands - offering some of the region's top beaches, grassy hillsides and spectacular cliff faces.

Clip.Title: SKY VIEW
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Soar over Europe and experience the landscape from an eagle's perspective. This remarkable series uses the latest HD and camera mount technology to give the audience a view of Europe and its history that will takes their breath away.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Her husband lies wounded, unable to walk, so Laura Secord sets out on a long journey to warn the British of a possible American attack.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Tecumseh forges an alliance with the British in pursuit of his dream of a unified First Nations.

Clip.Title: THE SILK ROAD
Clip.Episode: From Wasteland to Motherland: Central Asia
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Journey through Central Asia, Russia and the Ukraine, and listen to the songs and stories of people who are longing to return to the homelands of their distant memories.

Clip.Title: DECADENCE: DECLINE OF THE WESTERN WORLD
Clip.Episode: Decadence: Decline of the Western World
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This is a critique of life in the Western world today and the vaules we may now take for granted. Throughout history all civilizations rise and fall, is the West next?

Clip.Title: THE SILK ROAD
Clip.Episode: From Wasteland to Motherland: Central Asia
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Journey through Central Asia, Russia and the Ukraine, and listen to the songs and stories of people who are longing to return to the homelands of their distant memories.
